content.description:
Namque, fateborfateor, -eri: to confess enim, levium spectacula rerum,
semper equos atque arma virum pugnasque canebam
et studio incassumincassus, -a, -um, adj.: useless volui exercere laborem.
content.question: In the sentence, what does exercere mean?

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 1.A: Identify the meaning of Latin words and phrases.
